name: OSSystemExtensionRequestDelegate
desc: A type that receives updates about the progress of a request.

items.name: func request(OSSystemExtensionRequest, didFinishWithResult: OSSystemExtensionRequest.Result)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the manager completed the request.

items.name: enum OSSystemExtensionRequest.Result
items.desc: The result of a completed request, possibly including additional information about the extensionâ€™s state.

items.name: func request(OSSystemExtensionRequest, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the manager failed to complete the request.

items.name: func requestNeedsUserApproval(OSSystemExtensionRequest)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user must grant approval before the manager can activate the extension.

items.name: func request(OSSystemExtensionRequest, actionForReplacingExtension: OSSystemExtensionProperties, withExtension: OSSystemExtensionProperties) -> OSSystemExtensionRequest.ReplacementAction
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has a different version of the extension installed on their system.

items.name: class OSSystemExtensionProperties
items.desc: Properties that identify a specific version of a system extension.

items.name: enum OSSystemExtensionRequest.ReplacementAction
items.desc: Actions for describing how the extension manager should resolve a version conflict.
